name: Wild Warrior
description: The Wild Warrior is a medium humanoid embodying survival essence, skilled in tracking and hunting, often found in natural terrains.
memorable: Excels in teamwork and crafting traps, making it a clever opponent.
goals: To survive and thrive in the wild, often utilizing stealth and traps.
relations: Likely encountered with other natural creatures or allies that complement its skills.
strengths: Strong abilities in stealth, environmental awareness, and teamwork.
weaknesses: Low hit points and limited damage output in direct confrontations.
attacks: Makes spear attacks with decent range and can create traps to restrain foes.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics, granting advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, both at a level of 12.
additional_information: Automatically discerns true north in outdoor environments.
Can conceal tracks effectively, making it difficult to trace.
Uses Quick Trap bonus action to hinder opponents.
Works best in coordinated attacks with allies.
test_queries: humanoid that uses teamwork in combat
creature that sets traps and ambushes
dangerous scout in forests and hills
